original_text: And the scribes which came down from Jerusalem said, He hath Beelzebub, and by the prince of the devils casteth he out devils.
korean_text: 예루살렘에서 내려온 서기관들은 그가 바알세불이 지폈다 하며 또 귀신의 왕을 힘입어 귀신을 쫓아낸다 하니

sentences.original_text: And scribes which came down from Jerusalem said
and by the prince of the devils
